= 信息管理 =

<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">快速添加</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击快速添加进入。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135754_JkCD_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135754_JkCD_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135902_Y0X6_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135902_Y0X6_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加信息</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击信息管理进入信息管理页面。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135945_F2Rc_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/135945_F2Rc_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">进入指定栏目，点击"添加"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140040_q3aq_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140040_q3aq_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a> <a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140113_2wfL_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140113_2wfL_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：使用此处的添加信息，栏目会默认设置为当前栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>3.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">编辑信息</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">进入指定栏目，选择需要编辑的信息，点击"编辑"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：同时只能对一条信息进行编辑操作。</span></p>
<p>

<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>4.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除信息</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">进入指定栏目，选择需要删除的信息，点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">提示</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：同时可以选择多条信息进行删除操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140301_WGVx_916014.gif" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/140301_WGVx_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
